reqs:
Pre-reqs: (Restricted to students with at least Second year standing; a previous course in Asian Canadian and Asian Migration Studies is recommended.)
ACAM 320A is a special topics course. The topic for 17W is "History and Legacies of Japanese Canadian Internment." Restricted to students with at least second-year standing. A previous course in Asian Canadian Asian Migration Studies (ACAM) is recommended. For more information, email acam.program@ubc.ca.
courseName: Selected Topics in ACAM Studies - HIST&LEGCY JPN
description: Selected Asian Canadian Asian Migration topics. Consult acam.arts.ubc.ca for this year's offerings.
